metadata.creator: Unknown
metadata.description: The first few minutes begins with an un-named quartet performing. After the quartet has finished their performance; Several groups representing Latin America perform different cultural dances of a great variety. Some of the songs have a narration explaining a bit about the culture. It also talks about family and how dance unites the countries and eliminates borders.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Festival Latino Americano
metadata.subject: La Palomita; Tupac; Latin America; Show Case; Various Performances; Music - La Palomita; Tupac; Latino America; Espectaculo; Varias Obras; Musica
